title: GrandadofCrypto
author: GrandadofCrypto
content: Good morning,We are running a bounty for translators to translate our altcoin announcement thread below:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5474339.0We require translation for the following languages:- Chinese- Japanese- Korean- Arabic- Spanish- German- Indian- French- Italian- Dutch- Russian- TurkishDO NOT JUST GOOGLE TRANSLATE .. This has to be done properly. We will be checking.To reserve a language:Comment: RESERVED (Language) and Discord name .. example: "RESERVED Chinese @funnylilmunchkin"Join our discord: https://discord.gg/jX2bPttK8R and comment in the general chat "I have reserved translation for (Language)"Please then email us the translation: marketing@innovatorchain.comLanguages are first come, first serve.REWARD: When the mainnet is live, you will receive 100 $INOV8 TokensThank you.

comments.author: God bless u
comments.body: If you need Urdu language (Pakistan) I am available to translate. Thanks
